T02D3607:229b-1: badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3607:229b-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3607:229b-4: rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3607:229b-5: rnal 'byor pas snga bar lngas nas zhal bsang ba
T02D3607:229b-6: la sogs pa byas nas dam tshig gi ri lu
T02D3607:229b-8: ri'i phug la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas
T02D3607:229b-9: su sna tshogs rdo rje'i stan la 'dug nas a'a
T02D3607:229b-10: li dang k'a li dbyangs lan gsum brjod pas bdag
T02D3607:229b-11: nyid rdo rje phag mor gyur nas de'i rnam pa
T02D3607:229b-12: can du 'gro ba thams cad nges par byas te
T02D3607:229b-13: / rang gi snying gar chu skyes dang nyi ma
T02D3607:229b-14: la bam yig dmar po bltas nas de las byung
T02D3607:229b-15: ba'i 'od zer dmar po bskal pa'i me lta bu'i
T02D3607:229b-16: shin tu mi bzad pa 'og min gyi gnas su
T02D3607:229b-17: song nas rdo rje phag mo 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D3607:229b-18: sku mdog dang phyag mchan dang ldan pa dang /
T02D3607:229b-19: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3607:229b-20: rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs nas bzhugs
T02D3607:229b-21: te / snying ga nas phyung ba'i 'od zer gyi mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D3607:229b-22: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3607:229b-23: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3607:229b-24: dge ba yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3607:229b-25: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3607:229b-26: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas
T02D3607:229b-27: nas tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi rnam par bsgoms te
T02D3607:229b-28: / de nas chos thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid du byas nas /
T02D3607:229b-29: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra svabh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3607:229b-30: zhes pa'i sngags kyi don mngon du byas nas skad cig gis mi gnas pa'i skur bsam par bya'o //
T02D3607:229b-31: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis ting nge 'dzin
T02D3607:229b-32: las rnam par bzhengs nas nam mkha' la yam ram
T02D3607:229b-33: bam lam yongs su gyur pa las gzhu'i dbyibs dang
T02D3607:229b-34: zur gsum dang zlum po dang gru bzhi rnams nag
T02D3607:230a-0: po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang ser @230a
T02D3607:230a-1: * // po rnams te 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i
T02D3607:230a-2: dkyil 'khor rnams snyeng nas steng du blta bar bya'o
T02D3607:230a-3: * // // de'i steng du sum yig las byung
T02D3607:230a-4: ba'i ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po che bzhi'i
T02D3607:230a-5: rang bzhin can lcog brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa
T02D3607:230a-7: de'i steng du aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um /
T02D3607:230a-8: aom badzra pr'a k'a r'a h'um bam h'um /
T02D3607:230a-9: aom badzra pam dza ra h'um yam h'um /
T02D3607:230a-10: aom badzra bi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D3607:230a-11: aom sha ra dz'a la tr'am sham tr'am /
T02D3607:230a-12: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'arka h'um h'um h'um /
T02D3607:230a-13: sngags 'di rnams kyis rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa'i rim pa drug go //
T02D3607:230a-14: bsgrubs nas de'i nang du gru bzhi la sogs pa'i
T02D3607:230a-15: mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang
T02D3607:230a-16: rnam par bsams nas de'i dbus su pam yig dmar
T02D3607:230a-17: po las skyes pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D3607:230a-18: de'i ze'u 'bru la a'a li k'a li yongs su
T02D3607:230a-19: gyur pa las zla ba dang nyid ma yang dag
T02D3607:230a-20: par sbyor ba 'od dmar po rdo rje'i nang du
T02D3607:230a-21: song ba las bam yig dmar po'i rang bzhin 'od
T02D3607:230a-22: rab tu gsal bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D3607:230a-23: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid
T02D3607:230a-24: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo se 'bru'i
T02D3607:230a-25: me tog lta bu phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3607:230a-26: phyag g-yas pa rdo rje'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02D3607:230a-27: g-yon na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga bsnams pa zhal gcig pa /
T02D3607:230a-30: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa /
T02D3607:230a-31: phyogs kyi gos can ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin can /
T02D3607:230a-32: zhabs g-yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa /
T02D3607:230a-33: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas sku la brgyan pa ;
T02D3607:230a-34: khrag 'dzag bzhin pa 'thung ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3607:230a-35: de nas shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi rnams
T02D3607:230a-36: la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du g-yon skor
T02D3607:230a-40: gzugs can ma rnams nag mo dang /
T02D3607:230a-43: dkar mo rnams te de rnams zhal gcig pa /
T02D3607:230a-45: phyag g-yon na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D3607:230a-46: g-yas na da ma ru dang gri gug bsnams pa /
T02D3607:230a-49: gcer bu zhabs g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3607:230b-0: phyag rgya lngas @230b rnam par brgyan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3607:230b-1: mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi rnams la byang chub kyi
T02D3607:230b-2: sems la sogs pas gang ba'i thod pa rnams bsgom
T02D3607:230b-3: par bya'o // de'i rjes la snying ga'i sa bon
T02D3607:230b-4: las 'od zer 'phros nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i ye
T02D3607:230b-5: shes kyi 'khor lo dza:yig gis spyan drangs nas /
T02D3607:230b-6: h'um yig gis rang dam tshig gi 'khor lo chu la chu bzhin du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3607:230b-7: bam yig gis bcings nas ho:yig gis mnyes par bya'o //
T02D3607:230b-8: de nas aom bam bhr'um h'um kham a'a:h'am ha /
T02D3607:230b-9: zhes pa'i yi ge rnams kyis skye mched rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3607:230b-10: lha mo drug gi dag pa dang ;
T02D3607:230b-11: / sngags kyi rkang pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i go char bya'o //
T02D3607:230b-17: phat phat sku thams cad la na bzar bya'o //
T02D3607:230b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku gsung thugs rnams
T02D3607:230b-19: la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du aom a'a:h'um
T02D3607:230b-20: zhes pa rnam par dgod do //
T02D3607:230b-21: bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3607:230b-22: de la sngags ni aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes so //
T02D3607:230b-23: thun mtshams gsum du gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas bcom ldan 'das ma bsgom par bya'o//
T02D3607:230b-24: spyod lam thams cad la go rims ji lta ba
T02D3607:230b-25: bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku gzugs kyis gnas
T02D3607:230b-27: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3607:230b-29: // / pandi ta chen po aa ba dh'u t'i pa
